p: The stem bark and leaves of O. minarum were collected from the Mata dos Macacos farm (22°08′47.2 ″S, 54°54′54.1 ″W) in the city of Dourados, Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil. The samples were identified by Prof. Dr. Zefa Valdivia Pereira and deposited in the Herbarium of the Faculty of Biological and Environmental Sciences (FCBA) in the Federal University of Grande Dourados (UFGD) under the registered number 5275 DDMS.
